protein.specific_function: This enzyme has 2 functions: it catalyzes the production of glutamine and 4-aminobutanoate (gamma-aminobutyric acid, GABA), the latter in a pyridoxal phosphate-independent manner (By similarity). Essential for proliferation of fetal skin fibroblasts.

go_class.description: cellular amino acid and derivative metabolic process
glutamine family amino acid metabolic process
